official_title: An Act making appropriations for public works for water and power development and energy research, including the Corps of Engineers - Civil, the Bureau of Reclamation, power agencies of the Department of the Interior, the Appalachian regional development programs, the Federal Power Commission, the Tennessee Valley Authority, the Nuclear Regulatory Commission, the Energy Research and Development Administration, and related independent agencies and commissions for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1976, and the period ending September 30, 1976, and for other purposes.
short_title: Public Works for Water and Power Development and Energy Research Appropriation Act

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended, roll call #349 (377-28)) Public Works for Water and Power Development and Energy Research Appropriation Act - =Title I: Energy Research and Development Administration= - Makes appropriations for the Energy Research and Development Administration for operating expenses and plant and capital equipment for fiscal year 1976 and the transition period through September 1976. =Title II: Department of Defense--Civil= - Makes appropriations for Army Corps of Engineers projects and administration for fiscal year 1976 and the transition period through September 1976. =Title III: Department of the Interior= - Makes appropriations for Bureau of Reclamation projects and administration for fiscal year 1976 and the transition period through September 1976. =Title IV: Independent Offices= - Makes appropriations for fiscal year 1976 and the transition period through September 1976 for the Appalachian Regional Commission, Delaware River Basin Commission, Federal Power Commission, Interstate Commission on the Potomac River Basin, Nuclear Regulatory Commission, Susquehanna River Basin, Tennessee Valley Authority, and Water Resources Council. =Title V: General Provisions= - Sets forth limitations on the use of funds appropriated under this Act.

titles.title: Public Works for Water and Power Development and Energy Research Appropriation Act

A bill making appropriations for public works for water and power development and energy research, including the Corps of Engineers - Civil, the Bureau of Reclamation, power agencies of the Department of the Interior, the Appalachian regional development programs, the Federal Power Commission, the Tennessee Valley Authority, the Nuclear Regulatory Commission, the Energy Research and Development Administration, and related independent agencies and commissions for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1976, and the period ending September 30, 1976.

An Act making appropriations for public works for water and power development and energy research, including the Corps of Engineers - Civil, the Bureau of Reclamation, power agencies of the Department of the Interior, the Appalachian regional development programs, the Federal Power Commission, the Tennessee Valley Authority, the Nuclear Regulatory Commission, the Energy Research and Development Administration, and related independent agencies and commissions for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1976, and the period ending September 30, 1976, and for other purposes.
